name: iFishies
description:
Play with a school of fish! Or just relax and watch them wander about as you listen to the soothing sound of ocean bubbles.

Tap once and the fish come to play.
Tap twice and they run away.
Trace your finger along the screen;
the fish follow you unless you're unseen.
Be gentle, though, for if you shake,
the fish will be scared by the ocean's wake...
